definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: So you are ready for whatever line declarer chooses.
sentences.chinese: 所以你能够对付庄家任何的打牌线路。

sentences.english: Unlike traditional bookmakers, Betfair punters bet against each other.
sentences.chinese: 不同于传统的庄家，在必发的赌客是互相赌的。

sentences.english: But the table demands that they bury the card and finish the hand.
sentences.chinese: 但庄家要求这张牌不算，并且赌完这一轮。

sentences.english: What do you do, for instance, if declarer plays a diamond?
sentences.chinese: 你会怎么打，例如，当庄家打出一张方块？

sentences.english: The dealer may also discard up to 2 cards from his hand.
sentences.chinese: 庄家有可能也放弃从他的2手牌。

sentences.english: Oddsmakers around town are taking bets on the length of her prison sentence.
sentences.chinese: 城中的庄家在打赌猜测她的囚刑到底会有多长。

sentences.english: The dealer harvest season, while I was harvesting a heart filled with thoughts and sense of loss.
sentences.chinese: 一季的庄家收获了，而我却收获着满心的思念和怅然。

sentences.english: The whole concept of the house advantage is an interesting one in modern money management.
sentences.chinese: “庄家优势”是个在现代理财学里很有意思的概念。

sentences.english: The player who first named the suit (or no-trump) is the declarer.
sentences.chinese: 最先叫出最后定约花色或无将的牌手为庄家。

sentences.english: There are no market makers in this security.
sentences.chinese: 有没有市场庄家在这方面的安全。

sentences.english: NO01, The croupier can give you chips, or you can go to the cashier.
sentences.chinese: 可以跟庄家换筹码，或是你可以到出纳那边去换。

definition: to take money or valuables out of storage/to recover/to ship goods/to extract (chemicals from solution)
to immobilize with a lasso/to be trapped in the stock market
(Tw) to pull sth up/(fig.) to give a boost to/to support
